channel.title: Ltsp?
channel.description: Hello, I would like to set one of these up, but I had a few questions: 1) Would I be able to do it if the server was ran under a virtual machine? 2) Would I be able to do this with the wireless cards on laptops being the workstations? 3) Would I be able to do this if said laptops had damaged hard drives [pretty sure the answer is yes, but just want to verify]? 4) How could I do this? Sorry If I seem uneducated in the area, but it's because I am.

item.title: Ltsp?
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

Hello, I would like to set one of these up, but I had a few questions:

  1. Would I be able to do it if the server was ran under a virtual machine?
  2. Would I be able to do this with the wireless cards on laptops being the workstations?
  3. Would I be able to do this if said laptops had damaged hard drives [pretty sure the answer is yes, but just want to verify]?
  4. How could I do this?
    Sorry If I seem uneducated in the area, but itâ€™s because I am.

Read full topic
